segments.text: What kind of work do you want to do when you finish university ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to work in the banking industry . I ’ Ve always been interesting in working for an international invest bank . I ’ d like to help people invest their money .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s a job that pays well . If you ’ re lucky , you might have opportunities to travel as well . Have you applied to any banks yet ? Our course will end soon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I ’ Ve sent letters to several banks . A few have invited me for interviews after we take our examinations .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well done ! I haven ’ t sent off any job applications yet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Which field would you like to work in ? have you decide yet ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ d like to work in marketing . I think I could have a good career in that field .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Perhaps you should apply to banks as well . They need people to market their service . As you said , the banking industry pays well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s great idea . Do you have the email address of human resource managers at any banks ?
segments.speaker: S1
